parameters.name: numrounds
parameters.description: Number of rounds to test. Each round contains 3-4 blocks (single,single,dual,dual

parameters.name: trialsperblock
parameters.description: Number of trials in each block within a round.  Not counting 8 practice trials at the beginning.

parameters.name: smallsize
parameters.description: Diameter or edge size of small stimuli

parameters.name: largesize
parameters.description: Diameter or edge size of large stimuli

parameters.name: doyoked
parameters.description: Whether there should be a fourth 'yoked' block within each round, encouraging them to make responses at the same time (within 50 ms of eachother).

parameters.name: stimtype
parameters.description: Stimulus type. 1=shape+size;2=arrow direction+size; 3=top and bottom arrows; 4=top and bottom with left/right offset (low interference)..

parameters.name: type4offset
parameters.description: Horizontal offset (in pixels) to use for stimtype 4
